definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Europe has some of the most stringent air-pollution limits in the world.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有一些世界上最严格的大气污染限制标准。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of air pollution on non-special immunity function of pupils.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨大气污染对小学生非特异性免疫功能的影响。

sentences.english: People began to be concerned about the air pollution here.
sentences.chinese: 人们起头对这里的大气污染暗示忧闷。

sentences.english: I can't believe that extra-thick layer of pollution that I've picketed against is what burned up the comet.
sentences.chinese: 我真不敢相信我一直反对的大气污染层竟然救了我们。

sentences.english: Britain also lags badly when it comes to reducing air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 此外，英国在减少大气污染方面做得也很不够。

sentences.english: The Sigu district of Lanzhou is one of the important industrial bases in China.
sentences.chinese: 兰州西固工业区是我国大气污染比较严重的地区之一。

sentences.english: Factory chimneys discharge smoke into the atmosphere and make it dirty.
sentences.chinese: 工厂的烟囱往空气里排烟，造成大气污染。

sentences.english: Factory chimneys discharge smoke into the atmosphere make it dirty.
sentences.chinese: 工厂的烟囱往空气里排烟，造成大气污染。

sentences.english: Atmospheric pollution in our country belongs to coal fume.
sentences.chinese: 我国大气污染属于煤烟型污染。

sentences.english: Other information and data with respect to the prevention of air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 其他与大气污染防治有关的情况和资料。

sentences.english: This article summarized the indicating function of bryophyte to air pollution.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了苔藓植物对大气污染的指示作用。

definition: fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
